alert.note: Alert for Boone County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Newton and southern Boone Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area, or 18 miles southwest of Jasper, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper... Lost Valley State Park... Piercetown... Erbie... Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area... Pruitt... Wayton... Boxley... Mossville... Compton... Low Gap... Fallsville... Crossroad... Vendor... Parthenon... Swain... Gum Springs in Newton County... Mt Judea... Dixon Ridge... Nail... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations
